results.title: Efficacy and safety of polyethylene glycol loxenatide in type 2 diabetic patients: a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials
results.text_hl: People who received @CHEMICAL_polyethylene_glycol_loxenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000601947 @@@PEX168@@@ alone or with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ showed more common @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal adverse effects@@@, especially @DISEASE_Postoperative_Nausea_and_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D020250 @@@nausea and vomiting@@@ (p < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Salamah HM, Marey A, Elsayed E, Hasan MT, Mahmoud A, Abualkhair KA, Abo-Elnour DE, Abdelhaleem IA, Abd-Elgawad M. results.title: Bictegravir and Metformin Drug-Drug Interaction in People with Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV)
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ TDD reductions in INSTI naive PWH (N = 3) did not correlate with reported @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@GI intolerances@@@.

results.title: Analysis of Reports Sent to the Portuguese Pharmacovigilance System and Published Literature Regarding the Safety of Metformin in the Elderly
results.text_hl: The analysis of the reports showed that "@<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal disorders@@@" was one of the most common classes reported, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone was the drug most commonly associated with serious @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal reactions@@@ that resulted in hospitalization.

citations.NLM: Esteves B, Monteiro C, Duarte APC. Analysis of Reports Sent to the Portuguese Pharmacovigilance System and Published Literature Regarding the Safety of Metformin in the Elderly Healthcare (Basel). 2023 Aug 3;11(15):. PMID: 37570437

results.title: The Role of Activating Transcription Factor 3 in Metformin's Alleviation of Gastrointestinal Injury Induced by Restraint Stress in Mice
results.text_hl: Despite the existing evidence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s protective effects on @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@GI injury@@@, the specific role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in psychological-stress-induced @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@GI injury@@@ remains elusive.

results.title: Metformin mitigates gastrointestinal radiotoxicity and radiosensitises P53 mutation colorectal tumours via optimising autophagy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ mitigates @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal radiotoxicity@@@ and radiosensitises @GENE_P53_PS @GENE_301300 @@@P53@@@ mutation @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colorectal tumours@@@ via optimising autophagy.

results.title: Metformin in therapeutic applications in human diseases: its mechanism of action and clinical study
results.text_hl: However, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ also results in some adverse effects, such as @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal complaints@@@, @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@, @DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@vitamin B12 deficiency@@@ and @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative disease@@@.

results.title: Metformin derivatives - Researchers' Friends or Foes?
results.text_hl: However, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has variable pharmacokinetics in patients, and due to its poor oral absorption, the therapeutic doses are relatively high, causing unpleasant @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal adverse effects@@@.

citations.NLM: Torunoglu ST, Zajda A, Tampio J, Markowicz-Piasecka M, Huttunen KM. Metformin derivatives - Researchers' Friends or Foes? Biochem Pharmacol. 2023 Aug 15;215():115743. PMID: 37591450
